title: Justin Trudeau - Wikipedia
snippet: Following a steady decline in popular support, the sudden resignation of deputy prime minister Chrystia Freeland in December 2024 and an ensuing political crisis, Trudeau announced in January 2025 that he would resign as prime minister and leader of the Liberal Party.

title: Justin Trudeau, Resigned. What Next for US – Canadian Relations? | Wilson Center
snippet: On January 6, 2025, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced his intention to resign as Liberal Party leader as soon as the party is able to choose a new leader.

title: Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau resigns
snippet: "Last night, over dinner, I told ... conference in Ottawa. "I intend to resign as party leader, as prime minister, after the party selects its next leader through a robust nationwide competitive process," he said....

title: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife announce their separation : NPR
snippet: TORONTO — Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife, Sophie Gregoire Trudeau, announced Wednesday that they are separating after 18 years of marriage.

title: Canada’s Trudeau announces resignation following party pressure amid criticisms of Trump, budget handling
snippet: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced his resignation after calls increased for his ouster over his handling of economic policies and threats levied by President-elect Trump that have threatened a 'tariff war.'
